Plot co-clustering score for different choices of k

plot_coclust_score.Rd

Plot co-clustering score for different choices of k

plot_coclust_score(bt, ks = NULL, fig_fn = NULL, ...)

Arguments

bt

output of bootclust
ks

k values to plot
fig_fn

filename of the output figure. if NULL figure would be plotted to the screen
...

additional paramters to ggplot2::ggsave

Value

ggplot object with the densities of k

Examples

data <- simulate_data(n = 200, sd = 0.6, nclust = 5, dims = 2, add_true_clust = TRUE)
bt <- bootclust(data %>% select(id, starts_with("V")), k_boot = 5, N_boot = 100, boot_ratio = 0.75)
#> bootstrapping
#> clustering bootstrapping results
#> calculating score for each k
plot_coclust_score(bt, ks = 2:5)
#> Picking joint bandwidth of 0.00683
#> Picking joint bandwidth of 0.0421
#> Picking joint bandwidth of 0.0297
#> Picking joint bandwidth of 0.0181
